example[0]: She lay awake all night in torment.
definition[1]: someone or something that makes you suffer a lot
example[1]: The journey must have been a torment for them.
definition[2]: to make someone suffer a lot, especially mentally
example[2]: Seth was tormented by feelings of guilt.
definition[3]: to deliberately treat someone cruelly by annoying them or hurting them
example[3]: The older boys would torment him whenever they had the chance.
